data.text: @docsam1984 Mr Shah, we believe our Airport Team is there and is assisting you. Do let us know in case you need more assistance and we wish you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi

@hedhealthcare Thanks for the #Shoutout. We are happy to note this and request you to DM us your PNR so we may have your feedback shared with the Concerned Team. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@whynotisit Hi, we'd like to look into this and request you to DM us the PNR and Contact Number of the customers so we may check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@shivanijha_ Ms Jha, we tried calling you on the registered Contact Number but the same wasn't connected. Please share an alternate Contact Number via DM along with your concern in detail so we may assist you accordingly. Thanks. ~Navi
@AmitCTweets Mr Chandra, what's wrong? We do want to know. Please DM us your PNR and Concern in more detail so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@dinesh_notani Mr Notani, we understand your concern and regret the experience. Please DM us your Contact Number so we may get in touch with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@parthvaid111 Mr Vaid, we are checking on this with our Airport Team and request you to DM us the images of Baggage Tag ( Attached to the Baggage you have currently ). Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@JohndoeKong Hi, we'd like to look into this and request you to DM us the screenshot of the error you are facing, so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi
@Nami_Gopal Dr Gopal, we are here and request you to share your Contact Number so we may get in touch with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@sairam_jujare Mr Jujare, we have noted your feedback and the same will be shared with the Concerned Teams for further review. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi

@pgirish524 Hi, we request you to visit https://t.co/DjVbpwBpUb to check the International Travel Guidelines and let us know via DM in case you need more assistance. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
